definitions.definition: a person who reports, especially one employed to report news or conduct interviews for newspapers or broadcasts.
examples: journalist, correspondent, newspaperman, newspaperwoman, newsman, newswoman, columnist, pressman; Moreinformalnewshound, hack, stringer, journo, newsie "my client has been instructed not to talk to reporters"Morenewshound, hack, stringer, journo, newsie my client has been instructed not to talk to reporters
